TopicTitle: [1.0] KerbPaint - Paint layering for parts (March 30th, 2016) Community Update

Articles.Content:
Thanks for this mod man. Really.

Having trouble with the Mk2 Fuselage adapter, and hoping for Science Jr., lab, etc. support.

Awesome mod! keep it up!

Edited January 4, 2014 by Ottomic

Ive got the 6 Service modules working.

@PART[serCom1m]

{

MODULE

{

name = ModulePaintable

Texture = 6comp

Shader = BumpSpec

DeepReplace = true

}

}

@PART[serCom2]

{

MODULE

{

name = ModulePaintable

Texture = 6comp

Shader = BumpSpec

DeepReplace = true

}

}

Thanks for this mod man. Really.

-snip-

Having trouble with the Mk2 Fuselage adapter, and hoping for Science Jr., lab, etc. support.

Awesome mod! keep it up!

Those are some sweet looking planes, even if the science parts kinda mess up the last one.
Just stopping by to say thanks.

Great mod, +REP

So you said you wanted to see screen shots, my first creations,:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Sadly i too have to report the srb bug, this srb wasn't even colored. (Just a hint, maybe this is a hidden opportunity, maybe the next thing is custom colored thrust )

P.S.: sorry for the blue tint on the first pictures, p used to be my picture button, so i would take a picture and highlight all parts.

Yeah, we really need that Mk2 to 1 adapter.

Texel pls.
i have a quick question, does KerbPaint prevent other people from downloading your stock painted rockets cause their painted?

i have a quick question, does KerbPaint prevent other people from downloading your stock painted rockets cause their painted?

I might be wrong but a good way to test would be to use the mod to paint a rocket and save. Then remove the mod. And try to load up your rocket. I think you should be fine though. I might have to drop the mod if some of the little bugs don't get dropped or more parts get added soon anyway. I'm thinking the mod author has moved on to other things like many of us do from time to time.

i have a quick question, does KerbPaint prevent other people from downloading your stock painted rockets cause their painted?

no, if you remove the mod it just resets the textures

Those are some sweet looking planes, even if the science parts kinda mess up the last one.

Thanks! Kerbpaint makes spaceplanes really enjoyable.

Yet another painted model I'm really proud of: the vKD 'Vulture'. It's got skycranes 'n' stuff :3

Edited January 10, 2014 by Ottomic
Mod (still) looks great, but until that SRB-exhaust bug is fixed, I won't be using it. Sorry.

I really like this mod, very nicely done Texel!! Can't wait till you get B9 support working.

I've got a couple of issues with stock parts. The Modular Girders, Structural panels, Mk2 to size 1 adapter (fuel tank) and aircraft wheels don't seem to paint (oh, and struts). Is there a way to add support in for these parts myself (as a quick hacky fix)? I tried copying the file in the PluginData/KerbPaint for solarPanels1_Paint and renamed it to structuralPanel1_Paint to see if that would work, but it didn't. Is there anyway for us lowly users to make parts paintable?

But regardless, this is a great mod. I've been working on an SR-71 and this mod is just... well, it flies a lot better in black!

before;

After;

If I could just paint the structural panels around the cockpit I'd be a very happy man.

Here's my latest iteraton of my Alkatraz Station, with seperate American, Chinese, and Russian modules, each self sufficient, an emergency lifeboat, a shuttle, and a boatload of LAb space for science.

Here's my latest iteraton of my Alkatraz Station, with seperate American, Chinese, and Russian modules, each self sufficient, an emergency lifeboat, a shuttle, and a boatload of LAb space for science.

http://i.imgur.com/zcTxlwt.png

is that many solar panels really nececary?

is that many solar panels really nececary?

Probably not, it just looks cooler.

Still my favorite mod.

Edited January 19, 2014 by Spartwo

About the big SRB smoke issue : it disappeared when I used this mod : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65754-HotRockets!-Particle-FX-Replacement

It's WIP so I'm not using it anymore (the SRBs are overheating too quickly) but maybe it will help you understand the bug... Hope it helps, good luck !
Just downloaded this to make some beautiful planes to share
painting structure parts would be awesome. also id like some invisibility paint to make my vtol ssto air show a little less obvious.

This plugin is great, very cool idea! And it works very good too. Here's the pride of the fleet, the KSS Prometheus VMN-01 (Vertical takeoff - Military ship - Nuclear power-1). It has enough delta-V to make round trips to all the planets, although Jool and Eeloo might require a refuel though. She has 6 crew and a lot of spray paint!

After a successful test run ending in a smooth, slow grass landing, the prototype K-1 Starmuncher was given a full paint job and tasked with a runway landing.

The plane flew off, as straight from the runway as anyone could ask for.

After an extremely smooth outward loop, nearly unbroken and still straight as an arrow, the plane aligned itself for the final approach.

And a perfect touchdown. The K-1 is now cleared for a wide range of applications.
nice craft superweegee, has a bit of a clone trooper color scheme to it (if you were to see the kerbals as clone troopers occasionally)
I know it's 2 months late, but could you PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE do the LLL parts? Thank you!
